name: Mobile Shop Purchasing Shop
description: An application designed to purchasing and inventory processes for mobile shops. Developed using JavaFX, the system offers an intuitive and responsive user interface for efficient management of mobile phones and accessories.
Key Features: Product Categorization: Organized inventory by brand, specifications, and price range for easy access.
Customer & Sales Management: Maintained customer records, tracked purchase history, generated invoices, and managed order workflows.
Inventory Management: Real-time stock tracking with low-stock alerts and dynamic inventory updates.
Search & Filtering: Enabled fast product lookup with filters by brand, model, price, and availability.
Optimized Data Handling: Implemented efficient database queries to ensure fast and reliable performance.
User Interface: Developed a clean, user-friendly interface using JavaFX for smooth and responsive navigation.
keyAchievements: Streamlined sales and inventory processes, reducing manual workload
Delivered a responsive and user-friendly interface for efficient navigation
Enhanced data accuracy and stock visibility through real-time updates
Demonstrated strong skills in OOP, UI/UX design, and database integration

name: Clinic Management System
description: A desktop-based clinic management system for handling patient records, prescriptions, inventory, and staff operations efficiently.
Key Features: Doctor Panel: Doctors can check patients, diagnose illnesses, and prescribe medicines digitally.
Patient History Access: View past prescriptions, diagnoses, and reports for informed decision-making.
Reception Panel: Register new patients, maintain records, and handle patient inquiries.
Admin Panel: Manage clinic inventory, doctor/receptionist profiles, and oversee prescription records.
Inventory Management: Monitor medical supplies and ensure availability of prescribed medicines.
User Interface: Built a clean and responsive UI using PyQt5 for seamless navigation.
Database Integration: Used MySQL for managing patient, doctor, and inventory records effectively.
keyAchievements: Developed a role-based system for doctors, receptionists, and admins.
Streamlined patient diagnosis and prescription workflow digitally.
Ensured real-time inventory visibility and control.

name: Smart City Collaborative Dashboard
description: A Smart City Dashboard to connect citizens, officials, and administrators for efficient city management and engagement.
Key Features: Admin Panel: Add/manage departments (e.g., transport, sanitation), assign tasks and roles, view real-time city maps with issues and proposals.
Department Dashboard: Internal chat, generate reports, track and resolve citizen complaints, and evaluate proposals.
Citizen Portal: File complaints via forms or AR, track resolution status, and vote on proposals to improve the city.
Real-time map integration with issue and proposal tracking.
Role-based access control for different user types (admin, officials, citizens).
Citizen engagement through complaint submission, tracking, and voting.
keyAchievements: Built a full-stack Smart City Dashboard within 10 hours at Technoverse.
Implemented real-time map and chat features for interactive civic engagement.
